image.title: Splash Screen
image.caption: Splash screen with the Best Wishes logo.

image.title: Password Protect Your Best Wishes
image.caption: Add a password to keep all wishes a secret. Can you guess this password?

image.title: View Upcoming Birthdays
image.caption: If there are no upcoming birthdays, you'll see this screen.

image.title: Select Days in Advance
image.caption: You can choose how many days in advance you'd like to see.

image.title: Add New Person
image.caption: Add friends, loved ones, neighbors, anyone!

image.title: Profile List
image.caption: View all the people you're planning to buy gifts for.

image.title: Create Profiles
image.caption: Add a person's name, birthday, their relationship to you, and their interests to brainstorm some gift ideas.

image.title: Add a Gift Idea
image.caption: Add a new gift idea. Pick an image, choose categories and occasions, write down descriptions, and save hyperlinks!

image.title: Add an Image
image.caption: Add an image from external storage or include an image URL to visually remember the gift idea.

image.title: Check External Permissions
image.caption: Make sure you check your external storage permissions to use import from gallery and backup/restore features!

image.title: View Item Detail
image.caption: View the details of the gift idea you saved.

image.title: Save to Purchase History
image.caption: Once you purchase the gift, move it to your purchase history to keep track!

image.title: Navigation Menu
image.caption: Choose from various options to maintain your wish list more easily!

image.title: Track Your Spending
image.caption: Set a budget and always keep track of how much you have left.

image.title: Choose an Occasion to Keep Track
image.caption: Keep track of any one occasion other than Christmas and birthday.

image.title: My Wish List
image.caption: Let's not forget your own best wishes. Save all the items you want!

image.title: Share Your Best Wishes
image.caption: Share to everyone the best wishes you have!

image.title: View All Items
image.caption: View all of your gift ideas on one page.

image.title: Track Your Purchase History
image.caption: Keep track of what you're buying. Yo don't want to buy too many gifts (although they will really appreciate that!)

image.title: Sort Lists
image.caption: Sort any lists wherever you see the sort button!

image.title: Change Currency
image.caption: Not using dollars? No problem. Easily change your currency symbol.

image.title: Save and Restore
image.caption: From settings, save and restore your files externally to not lose gift ideas and profiles.

image.title: Landscape View for Profiles
image.caption: Compatibility in landscape mode is added as well!

image.title: Landscape View for Budgets
image.caption: Keep track of your budgets in landscape mode as well.
